DOC.brief_summary: -Purpose : To develop evaluate intervention design improve consistent contraceptive use dual method use particular , among female sex worker ( FSWs ) Rift Valley Province Kenya . Design : A qualitative descriptive study conduct develop intervention . A quasi-experimental , non-randomized , two-group , pre-/post-intervention design use evaluate intervention . Study Population : FSWs live Naivasha , Gilgil , Nanyuki , Rift Valley Province . Study Duration : Phase I - 3 month Phase II - 12 month Objectives : Develop intervention design increase contraceptive use among FSWs incorporate formative data behavioral theory involve target audience service provider development intervention . Examine effectiveness intervention increase non-barrier modern contraceptive use dual method use among FSWs . Assess feasibility acceptability intervention , part client ( FSW ) service provider . Estimate unit cost provide service one client . Study Site : Rift Valley Province , Kenya
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Peer Education Program Promote Family Planning Among Female Sex Workers Kenya
DOC.detailed_description: The goal study develop evaluate theory-based intervention could incorporate routine health service improve sexual reproductive health woman engage sex work demonstrate effective . To accomplish goal , study conduct two phase . During first phase study , FSWs service provider study site assist design intervention , effort increase likelihood accept , feasible , effective . Brief formative research conduct FSWs service provider , follow work group meeting self-selected FSWs , service provider , GSKenya representative review data work study investigator and/or designees design intervention . During second phase study , intervention implement evaluate . The study plan two site within Rift Valley Province , Kenya . The first `` site '' comprise two adjacent town , Naivasha Gilgil . The town Nanyuki serve second site . Based finding formative phase study , observation feedback provider , package enhancement current package service deliver FSW implement evaluate . - Family Planning ( FP ) Messaging peer educator informational material material - Peer educator train use exist material deliver accurate message FP/dual method use , individual encounter group session . - Screening unmet FP need drop-in center - Integration FP need screen service delivery point increase number FSW access FP . This do sensitization service provider provision brief job aid use screen client unmet need , include unmet need dual method use . - Providers FP counsel job aid - The AIDS , Population Health Integrated Assistance ( APHIA ) Plus project adapt exist Balanced Counseling Strategy Plus : A Toolkit Family Planning Service Providers Working High HIV/Sexually Transmitted Infection ( STI ) Prevalence Settings provider use within context DICs referral site catchment area . - Commodities - increase method mix - The method available woman attend service DIC expand . In addition current oral contraceptive pill , DMPA , male female condom , intra-uterine contraceptive device ( IUCD ) implant added mix method available . Hours DIC operation - Based finding formative phase study , hour operation DICs extend late evening hour accommodate schedule FSW .
